sentences.english: First came the PLA men, then the people's militia.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放军走在前面，其次是民兵。

sentences.english: Violence troops of People Liberal Troops sending to SiChuan has reached more than 0.13million .
sentences.chinese: 派往四川的人民解放军，武警部队达到十三万多。

sentences.english: Characterization of the North China People's support and the people's Liberation Army to fight a bloody battle scenes.
sentences.chinese: 刻画了华北人民支前和人民解放军浴血奋战的场景。

sentences.english: The PLA men launched a converging attack on the enemy force in many column.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放军对敌人的多个纵队进行了集中兵力的进攻。

sentences.english: The heroic deeds of Lei Feng embodied the glorious tradition of the PLA.
sentences.chinese: 雷锋的英雄事迹体现了人民解放军的光荣传统。

sentences.english: They are making our thousands of warriors of the PLA go hungry in the cantonment .
sentences.chinese: 他们让数万人民解放军的战士们在营房里挨饿。

sentences.english: He was taken captive by the P. L. A. men at the first engagement.
sentences.chinese: 他在第一次交锋时被人民解放军战士俘虏。

sentences.english: Its founder served in the People's Liberation Army.
sentences.chinese: 华为创始人曾在人民解放军中服役。

sentences.english: Cadres of the PLA include officers and non- ranking cadres.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放军的干部包括军官和文职干部。

sentences.english: Well, in South Sudan we have an action plan with the SPLA.
sentences.chinese: 在南苏丹，我们与苏丹人民解放军有个实施计划。

sentences.english: When the People's Liberation Army crossed the Yangtse River, the U. S. colonial government at Nanking fled helter-skelter.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放军横渡长江，南京的美国殖民政府如鸟兽散。
